SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.net

Interface RmiClientInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiClientImpl
public interface RmiClientInterface extends Remote
This interface defines the methods that can be invoked by clients through RMI.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Method Details

    • nop

      void nop() throws RemoteException
      Method called to perform an empty operation.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onAchievedCommonGoal

      void onAchievedCommonGoal(String nicknamePlayer, List<Coordinate> tiles, int numberCommonGoal) throws RemoteException
      Method called when a common goal is achieved.
      Parameters:
      nicknamePlayer - the nickname of the player who achieved the goal.
      tiles - a list of Coordinates representing the tiles involved in the goal.
      numberCommonGoal - the number of the completed common goal.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onAchievedPersonalGoal

      void onAchievedPersonalGoal(String nickname, List<Coordinate> tiles) throws RemoteException
      Method called when a personal goal is achieved.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who achieved the goal.
      tiles - a list of Coordinates representing the tiles involved in the goal.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onAdjacentTilesUpdated

      void onAdjacentTilesUpdated(String nickname, List<Coordinate> tiles) throws RemoteException
      Method called when adjacent tiles are updated for a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose adjacent tiles have been updated.
      tiles - a list of Coordinates representing the updated adjacent tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onAssignedCommonGoal

      void onAssignedCommonGoal(String description, int n, String id) throws RemoteException
      Method called when a common goal is assigned.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the assigned common goal.
      n - the number of the assigned common goal.
      id - the common goal id.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onAssignedPersonalGoal

      void onAssignedPersonalGoal(String nickname, List<EntryPatternGoal> goalPattern, Map<Integer,Integer> scoreMap) throws RemoteException
      Method called when a personal goal is assigned.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to whom the personal goal is assigned.
      goalPattern - a list of EntryPatternGoal representing the pattern of the personal goal.
      scoreMap - a map associating the number of the common goal with the obtained score.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onBoardRefilled

      void onBoardRefilled() throws RemoteException
      Method called when the board is refilled with tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onBoardUpdated

      void onBoardUpdated(TileSubject[][] tileSubjects) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the board is updated.
      Parameters:
      tileSubjects - a matrix of TileSubject representing the updated board.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onBookShelfUpdated

      void onBookShelfUpdated(String nickname, TileSubject[][] bookShelf) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the bookshelf is updated for a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose bookshelf has been updated.
      bookShelf - a matrix of TileSubject representing the updated bookshelf.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onChangedCommonGoalAvailableScore

      void onChangedCommonGoalAvailableScore(int score, int numberOfCommonGoal) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the available score for common goals changes.
      Parameters:
      score - the available score for common goals.
      numberOfCommonGoal - the number of available common goals.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onCurrentPlayerChangedListener

      void onCurrentPlayerChangedListener(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the current player changes.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the current player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onException

      void onException(String playerCause, Exception e) throws RemoteException
      Method called when an exception occurs.
      Parameters:
      playerCause - the player that caused the exception
      e - the exception that occurred.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onLastPlayerUpdated

      void onLastPlayerUpdated(String nicknameLastPlayer) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the last player is updated.
      Parameters:
      nicknameLastPlayer - the nickname of the last player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onMessageSent

      void onMessageSent(String nicknameSender, List<String> nicknameReceivers, String text) throws RemoteException
      Method called when a message is sent.
      Parameters:
      nicknameSender - the nickname of the message sender.
      nicknameReceivers - a list of nicknames of the message receivers.
      text - the text of the message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onMessagesSentUpdate

      void onMessagesSentUpdate(List<String> senderNicknames, List<List<String>> receiverNicknames, List<String> texts) throws RemoteException
      Method called when multiple messages are sent.
      Parameters:
      senderNicknames - a list of nicknames of the message senders.
      receiverNicknames - a list of lists of nicknames of the message receivers.
      texts - a list of texts of the messages.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onPlayerStateChanged

      void onPlayerStateChanged(String nickname, PlayerState playerState) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the state of a player changes.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player.
      playerState - the state of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onPlayersListChanged

      void onPlayersListChanged(List<String> players) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the players list changes.
      Parameters:
      players - a list of nicknames of the players.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onPointsUpdated

      void onPointsUpdated(String nickName, int scoreAdjacentGoal, int scoreCommonGoal1, int scoreCommonGoal2, int scoreEndGame, int scorePersonalGoal) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the scores of a player are updated.
      Parameters:
      nickName - the nickname of the player.
      scoreAdjacentGoal - the score of the adjacent goals.
      scoreCommonGoal1 - the score of the first common goal.
      scoreCommonGoal2 - the score of the second common goal.
      scoreEndGame - the score of the end game.
      scorePersonalGoal - the score of the personal goal.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onStateChanged

      void onStateChanged(GameState gameState) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the game state changes.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the game state.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.

    • onWinnerChanged

      void onWinnerChanged(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method called when the winner of the game changes.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the new game winner.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote connection error occurs.
